October 9» 1952
Governor Kerr Scott
State Souse
Haleigh, North Carolina
Dear Governor Scott!
The National Association of Educational
Broadcasters is seeking a new Executive Director, The
harae of Mr. Earl Wynn, Communications Center, university
of North Carolina, has been suggested to us.
The person we seek is one interested in education—
in educational radio and television, one who has administrative
ability, personality, imagination, and proven leadership.
For the Bpecial committee considering the
possible candidates, would you be kind enough to give us
your impressions and evaluations of Mr. Wynn for the
position.
For your information, I might explain that NAEB
is an association of practically all educational radio
and television stations in the USA,
Xour kindness will be appreciated.
Sincerely yours,
FESsfmh
Frank B. Schooley
Treasurer
